title: letter to smithsonian
abstract:
April 17, 2006
The Honorable Lawrence M. Small
Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution
100 Jefferson Drive, SW
Washington, D.C.  20560
Dear Secretary Small:
We are writing to express our deep concern over the recent announcement of the creation of 
“Smithsonian Networks,” a joint venture between the Institution’s Smithsonian Business Ven-
tures Unit and Showtime Networks.
According to Jeanny Kim, Vice President for Media Services at Smithsonian Business Ventures, 
ﬁlmmakers and researchers who
